name: Full Desktop Environment
description: A full-featured development container with a desktop environment, GUI apps, and a web-based viewer of your choice. Add your own customizations as needed.

webViewer.label: Web Viewer
webViewer.description: Choose the web-based viewer for the desktop environment.

desktopEnv.label: Desktop Environment
desktopEnv.description: Choose the desktop environment to install if using noVNC or Apache Guacamole as the web viewer. (automatically selects latest stable version)

os.label: Base OS
os.description: Choose the base operating system for the development container.

vncPassword.label: VNC Password
vncPassword.description: Set the password for vnc server. (default: none)
